column3:
No upnp built: USE_UPNP=
upnp built but disabled by default: USE_UPNP=0
upnp built and enabled bt default: USE_UPNP=1
Please read build-unix.txt, it explains this.\n
Is UPNP enabled the intended default behavior?\n
Built in, but disabled by default ie USE_UPNP=0, which is the intended default.\n
ahh, it's also the flag for the default runtime setting, didn't realize that.\n
